1.2.10.1: Add an rule on APC dataset lines checking
1.2.10.2: Add SpaCy model config in classic APC models
1.2.10.3: Not fully tested for all situations

1.2.9.1: Add an rule on APC dataset lines checking
1.2.9.2: You can use multiple types of label in your dataset, e.g., string, number

1.2.8.2: Fix the error to load a inference model from training, i.e., use trainer.load_trained_model() to load the inference model
1.2.8.3: Fix a bug of batch size setting in atepc inference
1.2.8.4: Fix a bug of auto label-mapping

1.2.4.2: Refactor APC inference to merge results with same text

1.2.3.2: Fix some problems in some particular situations

1.2.2.1: Full support of flexible datasets, update ABSADatasets to version 2021.10.02
1.2.2.2: Support batch_size setting in ATEPC, APC, TC inference
1.2.2.3: Fix the inference of DLCF_DCA model

1.2.0.1: Enhance to support more flexible labels, now you can define string-based label instead of integer labels
1.2.0.2: Remove set_sentiment_map() support due to above modification
1.2.0.3: Fix a problem may cause problem while building graph for combined datasets
1.2.0.4: Fix a printing problem in ATEPC
1.2.0.5: Fix a bug in inference set loading
1.2.0.7: This version involves considerable modification and may contain potential bug

1.1.23.1: Improve atepc aspect_extractor result, ensure final output is same length and order as original input examples
1.1.23.2: Fix a problem may merge all aspects of different example into 1 line if duplicate example is fed
1.1.23.3: Fix a problem may cause error in text classification

1.1.22.1: Improve dataset search to be more flexible
1.1.22.2: Refactor label-mapping trigger. This feature is developed based on the mooc dataset: https://github.com/jmc-123/ABSADatasets/tree/master/datasets/apc_datasets/Chinese/mooc
1.1.22.3: Fix the batch inference of text classification
1.1.22.4: Fix the text classification dataset downloading problem
1.1.22.5: Fix a problem may cause failure of ATEPC inference
1.1.22.6: Add the dependency declaration of typing_extensions

1.1.19.1: Fix training without testset in APC
1.1.19.2: Add SpaCy model setting option, e.g., config.spacy_model = 'zh_core_web_sm'

1.1.18.1: Reformat and fix a bug of ATEPC output

1.1.17.1: Add a new Chinese shampoo dataset, thanks to brightgems@github
1.1.17.4: Fix the training and inferring LCA-Net model

1.1.16.1: Enable flexible dataset format for ATEPC dataset, see https://github.com/yangheng95/PyABSA/issues/78
1.1.16.2: Fix a bug may cause checkpoint loading problem on no-cuda device

1.1.13.2: Add batch inference for APC and ATEPC, temporarily using freeze batch size

1.1.12.1: Enable downloading shared checkpoint from a google drive url, this is for downloading checkpoint not registered in PyABSA
1.1.12.3: Add LCF-BERT2 and LCFS-BERT2 demo models

1.1.9.1: Fix a problem in BERT-ATEPC model

1.1.8.1: Fix a problem may cause checkpoint saving failure

1.1.7.1: Fix the inference of ATEPC using internal datasets, if you are using 1.1.5 or 1.1.6, please update to this version
1.1.7.2: Improve stability and test all examples

1.1.3.1: Fix the feature to resume/retrain from a checkpoint

1.0.6.1: Fix potential error loading GloVe-based model's checkpoint.

1.0.5.1: Fix potential error loading ATEPC checkpoint.

1.0.4.1: Add checkpoint save options, default to save the state_dict instead the whole model

0.9.2.0.1: Add text classification (training & inference) support and SST datasets

0.9.1.0.1: Add model type check before retraining
0.9.1.0.2: Fix syntax distance measure for ATEPC models

0.9.0.6.4: Fix a problem may causing failure while search inference datasets

0.9.0.0.1: Add BERT baseline models, not available until full test
0.9.0.0.2: Refactor some code to allow add model easier
0.9.0.0.3: Add post-training feature: to train based on a pretrained PyABSA model, refer to https://github.com/yangheng95/PyABSA/issues/48
0.9.0.0.4: Add batch inference (from file) for ATEPC
0.9.0.0.5: Fix a bug while predicting sentiment polarity using ATEPC model, refer to https://github.com/yangheng95/PyABSA/issues/47

0.8.9.4.1: Fix the inference of DLCF_DCA model

0.8.9.3rc1.1: Add evaluation for glove-based APC models

0.8.9.2.1: Refactor parameter loading method to manage parameters depend on specific model (Note you need to clone the latest examples after updating)
0.8.9.2.3: Plan to enable BERT for baseline models

0.8.9.1.1: Add GloVe models support for APC, available model list: AOA, ASGCN, ATAE-LSTM, Cabasc, IAN, LSTM, MemNet, MGAN, RAM, TC/TD-LSTM, TNet_LF
0.8.9.1.3: Next Step: Add inference support for GloVe-based APC models

0.8.8.8.2: Add release note with open source code

0.8.8.5.1: Add new datasets (T-shirt, Television, Copyright belongs to https://github.com/rajdeep345/ABSA-Reproducibility)
0.8.8.5.2: Add polarity label-fix features for some datasets containing negative labels
